Aug 06, 2021 Signed a 1 year $2.64 million contract with Los Angeles (LAL)

Mar 27, 2021 Fined $4,000 for ejection from PHI-LAC game

Mar 25, 2021 Fined $2,000 for ejection from PHI-LAL game

Nov 21, 2020 Signed a 1 year $2.6 million million contract with Philadelphia (PHI)

Aug 26, 2019 Signed a 1 year $2.56 million contract with Los Angeles (LAL)

Aug 24, 2019 Waived by Memphis (MEM) - agreed to buyout

Jul 06, 2019 Traded to Memphis (MEM) from Washington (WAS) for C.J. Miles

Apr 18, 2019 Exercised $5.6 million option with Washington (WAS) for 2019-20

Jul 11, 2018 Signed 2 year $10.9 million contract with Washington (WAS)

Jul 07, 2018 Waived by Brooklyn (BKN) - agreed to buyout reducing salary by $5 million

Jul 06, 2018 Traded to Brooklyn (BKN) from Charlotte (CHA) for Timofey Mozgov, 2021 2nd round pick, $5 million, [to be processed in July] and Hamidou Diallo

Nov 25, 2017 Fined $35,000 for obscene gesture to Cleveland fans during CHA-CLE game

Jun 20, 2017 Traded to Charlotte (CHA) from Atlanta (ATL) with 2017 2nd round pick (#31) for Miles Plumlee, Marco Belinelli and 2017 2nd round pick (#41)

Jul 12, 2016 Signed a 3 year $70.5 million contract with Atlanta (ATL)

Jul 09, 2016 Houston (HOU) renounced their free-agent exception rights

Jun 21, 2016 Declined $23.3 million option with Houston (HOU); becomes an Unrestricted Free Agent

Feb 02, 2016 Suspended 1 game (forfeit $131,526) for contact with official during WAS-HOU game

May 11, 2015 Fined $15,000 for making contact above the shoulders on Matt Barnes during HOU-LAC game (playoff)

May 10, 2015 Fined $2,000 for ejection from HOU-LAC game (playoff)

Jan 13, 2015 Fined $15,000 for altercation with Kevin Garnett during HOU-BKN game

Nov 21, 2013 Fined $25,000 for “throwing the ball into the stands” due to heckling fan during HOU-DAL game

Jul 13, 2013 Signed a 4 year $87.5 million maximum contract with Houston (HOU)

Mar 15, 2012 Voided ability to terminate his contract early

Jul 12, 2007 Signed a 5 year $83.2 million rookie scale extension with Orlando (ORL)

Mar 27, 2006 Orlando (ORL) exercised $6.06 million option for 2007-2008

Jul 07, 2004 Signed a 3 year $13.5 million contract with Orlando (ORL)

Jun 24, 2004 Drafted by Orlando (ORL): Round 1 (#1 overall)
